Hey Bruce -- I added you to my Skype list. Still anxiously awaiting my
package -- lol
 
Brenda

  _____  

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
bruce halliday
Sent: Wednesday, March 26, 2008 1:59 PM
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC



mike my skype contact name is bruce halliday




Bruce Halliday 

 
<http://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cd
iv%20class=> 



  _____  

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: urkel23@...
Date: Wed, 26 Mar 2008 15:30:28 +0000
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC



Skype is free internet phone from Pc to Pc. You can download it for 
free at www.skype.com

I'm keyportparanormal on there and maybe we can involve you in a 
future box session over skype.

-Steve H.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> .com, Michael
Edwards <f1cracker75@...> 
wrote:
>
> What is a Skype session?
> 
> 
> 
> Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:
> Mike,
> 
> I haven't done that personally, because i don't think that the 
> communication is at the point to receive full sentences. You get a 
> couple words here and there that we can piece together to make 
> somewhat of a sentence, but i don't believe anybody has reached 
that 
> stage yet. If i got a full sentence that would be great, but it 
> probably wouldn't be clear enough to post on the board. If i have 
to 
> explain what it says to convince people to hear it, than it' s 
> probably nothing. When in doubt, throw the file out. I try to form 
> the questions for the most part in Yes and No format, it seems they 
> can always respond with yes and no. I do get other stuff that is 
> good, but i try and keep it simple for them. And frank just sits 
> back and listens without asking questions allowing them to get that 
> message across. I prefer to ask questions, because i know when to 
> wait for a response. The Skype session i had with my Joe's box last 
> friday with Juli and Joel was a great example of getting good 
> communication. We were getting answers to all our questions and 
> that "Frank Sumption" file was one of the clearest i have ever 
heard 
> come through my Joe's Box #2, which is now broken again. Juli has 
> all the audio and will post more as she goes through it for 
everybody 
> to hear.
> 
> -Steve H.
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> .com, Michael
Edwards <f1cracker75@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > Hi Steve, hope all is well with you.
> > 
> > From this site it appears that yourself, Frank, Bruce, and 
> Kristin and others I can not think of at the moment, have been 
> engaged in contact as such that you ask a question and they give an 
> answer. Have any of you ever taken the info you receive from lets 
say 
> one spirit and tried to contact their living relative to give them 
a 
> copy of the recording? Have spirits asked you more experienced 
> researchers to do that, and if so, was the person you contacted 
> indeed the correct loved one, and what was their response in you 
> contacting them? I think this would be awesome to be able to serve 
> as a messenger to the deceased
> > 
> > Mike Edwards Cary NC
> > 
> > Steve Hultay <urkel23@> wrote:
> > I heard "Help" twice and than "Lord". The second "help" 
> is in the 
> > static white noise area after the first really clear one.
> > 
> > -Steve H.
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> .com,
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> .com wrote:
> > >
> > > 
> > > Hello,
> > > 
> > > This email message is a notification to let you know that
> > > a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
> > > group.
> > > 
> > > File : /Rhonda's Folder/help us laurie or lordy.mp3 
> > > Uploaded by : rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@> 
> > > Description : dont know if Im hearing things..this was in 
between 
> > questions and answers.....sounds like help us lordy or 
> laurie....but 
> > need another ear plz. 
> > > 
> > > You can access this file at the URL:
> > > http://groups. <http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Rhonda's%>
yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Rhonda%27s%
> > 20Folder/help%20us%20laurie%20or%20lordy.mp3
